ooc:That's what you call creativity?!?! -_-' It would be if it wasn't 
serious

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, shut up. It's not your character, it's Catmastero's. 
You can't control Catmastero's character. Yeah, I'm still here. And 
this is the most creative thing I can do, but I still had to make my 
point. Dewboy, stop wasting board space and then making me waste board 
space having to reply, it's sickening and upsetting. Wait, I know.
> 
> BIC: Deemos shoots a rock. Shokaract eats a rock. The Hero tries to 
lift a rock and fails. Atma sits on a rock. Arrow looks at a rock.
> 
> OOC: Now THAT is creativity...
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Kyle Stewart
>   To: nbwrpg@y...
>   Sent: Wednesday, May 15, 2002 7:50 PM
>   Subject: Re: Maximals Attack!
> 
> 
>   OOC: WASPINATOR BLOCKED A BLAST!  WHY DON'T YOU JUST
>   CREATE A NEW CHAR AND SAY HIS NAME HAPPENS TO BE
>   WASPINATOR IF HE CAN ACTUALLY BLOCK INSTEAD OF BLOWING
>   UP!
> 
>   --- catmastero <catmastero@y...> wrote:
>   > Waspinator got singed from the flame and used his
>   > right arm to black 
>   > it from his face but was taking damage fast, he
>   > fired his gun at 
>   > Grimlock with the other hand.
>   > 
>   > Quickstrike arrived at the battle site, he had run
>   > ahead of the rest 
>   > of the group (OOC: I got tired of waiting for a
>   > reply from 
>   > them) "Quickstrike terrorize" he exclaimed and
>   > transformed into robot 
>   > mode "Now let's get to thrashing maxies" he said and
>   > fired a energy 
>   > blast out of his snake head's mouth at Kup.
>   > 
>   > Kenzo landed and transformed into robot mode and
>   > waited to provide 
>   > medical support for the maximals.
